content.rendered:
Mannheimer Swartling Brussels is a specialist office for EU and competition law, with dedicated lawyers working in close collaboration with EU and competition experts from our other offices.

The group handles EU and competition court proceedings, merger notifications to the EU Commission and national authorities, free movement of goods and services, as well as state aid and trade law.

Efficient case management

Our lawyers in Brussels represent clients before the EU Commission and the EU courts and have close contact with other central institutions. The team constantly tracks developments in order to steer our clients’ matters through evolving legislation and case law.
